mapper.insert: insert into notice( num, userId, title, content )values( nextval('num_seq'), #{userId}, #{title}, #{content} )

insert into board_attach ( board_type, board_id, file_num, file_name, saved_file_name, file_size )values ( 'Notice', #{board_id}, nextval('seq_file_num'), #{file_name}, #{saved_file_name}, #{file_size} )
mapper.select: select num, userId, title, content, createAt, readcount from notice where num=#{num}
select saved_file_name from board_attach where board_id = #{num};
mapper.update: update notice set readcount = readcount+1 where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select num, userId, title, content, TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(createAt, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') "createAt", readcount from notice ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE num = #{num} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM notice WHERE num = #{num} and userId = #{userId}
